rukus.text: 50|2|baram tara bismaya bodha kare ye, tadera madhya theke ekajana satarkakari tadera kache esechena. Ara kaphirara bale, ‘e to eka ascarya jinisa
50|3|‘amadera mrtyu hale ebam amara matite parinata hale amara ki punarukhita haba? E phire ya'oya suduraparahata.’
50|4|Abasya'i amara jani mati ksaya kare tadera katatuku ebam amadera kache ache samyaka sanraksanakari kitaba.
50|5|Bastuta tadera kache satya asara para tara tate mithyaropa kareche. Ata'eba, tara sansayayukta bisaye nipatita [1].
50|6|Tara ki tadera upare abasthita asamanera dike takiye dekhe na, amara kibhabe ta nirmana karechi o take susobhita karechi ebam tate kono phatala'o ne'i
50|7|ara amara bistrta karechi yaminake ebam tate sthapana karechi parbatamala. Ara tate ud‌gata karechi nayana pritikara sarbaprakara udbhida
50|8|allahara anuragi pratyeka bandara jan'ya jnana o upadesasbarupa.
50|9|Ara asamana theke amara barsana kari kalyanakara brsti atahpara ta dbara amara utpanna kari udyana, kartanayogya sasya dana
50|10|o samunnata khejura gacha yate ache guccha guccha khejura
50|11|bandadera riyikasbarupa. Ara amara brsti diye sanjibita kari mrta saharake; ebhabe'i ut'thana ghatabe [1].
50|12|Tadera age'o mithyaropa karechila nuhera sampradaya, ras era adhibasi [1] o samuda sampradaya
50|14|Ara a'ikara adhibasi [1] o tubba’ sampradaya [2]; tara sakale'i rasulaganera prati mithyaropa karechila [3], phale tadera upara amara sasti yatharthabhabe apatita hayeche.
50|15|Amara ki prathamabara srsti kare'i klanta haye parechi! Baram natuna srstira bisaye tara sandehe patita [1]
